sentences: Minu meel on kinnitatud sind suunas.
Aktsia hind on jäänud kinnitatud samale tasemele.
Mingi asja toatemperatuur peab olema kinnitatud.
context: 'kinnitatud' is commonly used in Estonian to describe something that has been confirmed, secured, or fixed into place. It can refer to both physical objects and abstract concepts such as decisions or prices.
